LanguageData.Ammo_MiniCannonBall_Round.label: маленьке ядро
LanguageData.Ammo_MiniCannonBall_Round.description: A solid ball of metal, capable of delivering significant damage on a direct hit.
LanguageData.Ammo_MiniCannonBall_Grape.label: маленький дрейфгагель
LanguageData.Ammo_MiniCannonBall_Grape.description: A canister of numerous metal balls, fired in a wide spread to deal horrific damage against enemy infantry.
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniCannonBall_Round.label: mini round shot
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniCannonBall_Grape.label: mini grape shot
